ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName="Grant" && (ISPICKVAL(ampi__Project_Status__c, "Concept in Formulation") || ISPICKVAL(ampi__Project_Status__c, "Application in Formulation")) && (ISBLANK( Start_Identification__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: One or more mandatory fields are missing for Status "Concept in Formulation" or "Application in Formulation". Start Identification Date
